original_text: All the people who had returned from Babylon made burnt offerings as sacrifices to Israel's God. They offered to the Lord 12 bulls on behalf of all Israel. They also offered 96 male sheep and 77 lambs. They killed 12 male goats as a sin offering. They gave all these to the Lord as burnt offerings.
korean_text: 사로잡혔던 자의 자손 곧 이방에서 돌아온 자들이 이스라엘의 하나님께 번제를 드렸는데 이스라엘 전체를 위한 수송아지가 열두 마리요 또 숫양이 아흔여섯 마리요 어린 양이 일흔일곱 마리요 또 속죄제의 숫염소가 열두 마리니 모두 여호와께 드린 번제물이라

sentences.original_text: All the people who had returned from Babylon
made burnt offerings as sacrifices to Israel's God
They offered to the Lord 12 bulls
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주님께 수소 열두 마리를 드렸다

sentences.original_text: They gave all these to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이 모든 것을 주님께 바쳤다
